participant_2.background:
I love the color green because it is calming and peaceful, which is something I need after a long day with my toddler.
I've been saving up my allowance to buy a new bike.
My daily routine consists of working on my knitting projects and learning new techniques.
i have 8 brothers and we are close.
I sometimes have a hard time relating to people who don't share my interests.

content.text: Hi! My name is Sara and I study philosophy at Mass. How are you?
Hi Sara, my name is Rachel. I'm a stay at home mom with 8 kids. I love to knit and I'm always saving up my allowance for new yarn. What are you hobbies?
I like to read, paint, and spend time with my family. I have an older brother who's gotten into trouble a few times, but we're still close.
I love the color green because it's calming and peaceful. I get a lot of that with my toddler, so I need it! I'm trying to save up for a new bike. What's your favorite place to eat?
I haven't found my favorite place to eat yet, but I'm always up for trying new things! My favorite book is The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy.
I've heard good things about that book. I'm not much of a reader, but I like to watch movies and TV shows. I love spending rainy days reading my favorite books.
I love rainy days too! It's the perfect time to curl up with a good book. What are some of your favorite movies and TV shows?
I love the Harry Potter movies and the TV show Friends. I also like watching documentaries and nature shows.
I love the Harry Potter movies too! I've read all the books and seen all the movies. I've never seen Friends, but I've heard good things about it.
It's a great show! You should definitely check it out. I think you'd like it.
I will, thanks for the recommendation!
